output_list.criticism: The mintToken function has an integer overflow that allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The freezeAccount function has a public modifier, allowing the owner to arbitrarily set whether a user's account should be frozen.
The burnFrom function has an integer overflow, allowing the owner to set the balance of a specific user to zero.
The burn function has an integer overflow, allowing the owner to set the balance of all users to zero.
